title: House Industries Holiday Gift Certificates and Specials
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029023942/http:/www.typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 6.Dec.2007 7.04am 

HOUSE INDUSTRIES GIFT CERTIFICATES AVAILABLE NOW

Is there a special someone in your life who has everything? We know for a fact that they don’t have near enough House Industries gear, so let’s solve that problem right now! Some features of our new gift certificate system:

-Includes a special die-cut personalized certificate mailed at no extra charge.

-Gift certificate codes are delivered via email so they can be used immediately.

-Gift certificate recipients can maintain a balance on the certificate and use it for multiple transactions.

-There is even an option to send a personalized note via email directly to the recipient.

Check them out here:

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=certificates](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029023942/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=certificates "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=certificates")

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

HOLIDAY SPECIALS

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=specials](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029023942/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=specials "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=specials")

Alexander Girard Alphabet Blocks: $75 (regular price $100)

Girard Blocks with AIGA New Mexico Poster: $85 ($135 Value)

House Industries Holiday Fonts: $80 (regular price $140)

House Industries Merino Wool Trainer: $100 (regular price  
$200)
author: paul d hunt
